title: IS_UPDATING_MP_GAMER_TAG_NAME_AND_CREW_DETAILS
content:
0xEB709A36958ABE0D0xF11414C4// IsUpdatingMpGamerTagNameAndCrewDetails
BOOL IS_UPDATING_MP_GAMER_TAG_NAME_AND_CREW_DETAILS(int playerId);Parameters:playerId: Local ID of the player.Returns: Returns if game code is currently updating gamer tag and crew details for a player's name tag.When this native returns true, do not call SET_MP_GAMER_TAG_NAME.Old name:  _HAS_MP_GAMER_TAG_2Old name:  _HAS_MP_GAMER_TAG_CREW_FLAGS_SETOld name:  _IS_VALID_MP_GAMER_TAG_MOVIE
